message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am hoping to keep my spending within $10,000. Would you be able to consider a price closer to that amount?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $10,000 is significantly below my minimum acceptable price.  I can come down to $10,500 to make it work for both of us.  Let me know if this is something you can accept.
